ygData.subject: RE: Problem with Anthem de Arms?
ygData.msgSnippet: Quite frankly I don t see how this is possible.  If you have the quicker weapon (lower delay) you should be swinging faster than her.  The affects of Anthem
ygData.messageBody:
Quite frankly I don't see how this is possible. If you have the quicker
weapon (lower delay) you should be swinging faster than her. The affects of
Anthem will be the same for all members in the group. The only thing I can
think of is that AGI or DEX might somehow be having an effect.

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 31 Bard [Povar]

> -----Original Message-----
> From: RaceFace [mailto:bean@...]
> Sent: Sunday, November 07, 1999 2:04 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Problem with Anthem de Arms?
>
>
> From: "RaceFace" <bean@...>
>
> >
> > Well it's POSSIBLE she has a flowing black silk sash..
> ?(haste item) I
> know
> > more than a few twinks sporting one of those.
>
> I know for a fact she doesn't. I've been playing with her
> for months, since
> I started EQ. We've played with both of our chars together.
> So, I still
> can't figure out what was going on. I *did* have SoW cast on
> me because I'm
> not as fast as SoW without a drum yet. I wonder if there's
> some sort of
> rare bug involved? <shrug> I'm going to test it out again
> today, hopefully.
>
